property.name: flink_numcontainers
property.description: Number of YARN container to allocate (=Number of Task Managers)

property.name: flink_numberoftaskslots
property.description: Number of task slots in each container

property.name: flink_queue
property.description: YARN queue to schedule Flink job on

property.name: flink_streaming
property.description: If true, Flink will be started in streaming mode: to be used when only streaming jobs will be executed on Flink

property.name: flink_jobmanager_memory
property.description: Memory for JobManager Container [in MB]. Must be at least 768

property.name: setup_prebuilt
property.description: If false, will compile Flink from source instead

property.name: hadoop_conf_dir
property.description: Hadoop conf dir. Needed to submit to YARN

property.name: flink_download_url
property.description: Snapshot download location. Downloaded when setup_prebuilt is true

property.name: flink_hadoop_shaded_jar
property.description: Flink shaded hadoop jar download location. Downloaded when setup_prebuilt is true
